text: Hey guys, I have an landing page that I currently built: <https://www.sertoriohomes.com.au/lookbook-asset-2020?hs_preview=nESbvLta-26742215558>, it's very slow due to so many images uploaded on it. Any ideas on how I could cache my images so that it could load faster, the images are all optimized. Thanks.

Hello,

We added a second subscription checkbox to a form (using the hs form tool and GDPR settings) and we need to clear cache to see it.. since we have a lot of returning visitors we feared that users won't see the new checkbox... What can I do? <https://solutions.jlr.ca/etude-marche-immobilier-montreal>
